THE WAR ON IMMIGRANTS
Home Talks Child Separation Detention Interior Enforcement Muslim Ban DACA Refugees General Resources


This is the companion website for an ongoing series of talks on the alarming escalation of anti-immigrant policies around the world. It includes webcasts for those talks that have been recorded (so far only the latest one), as well as resources for further exploring the issues.

NOTE: The resources are still under construction. Please check back soon for a more complete list.



This site was written by John Palmer based on the Blog template built for Bootstrap by @mdo. The code is available at https://github.com/waronimmigrants/waronimmigrants.github.io.
